summary: Simple loading screen without 3D models, the inscription "LOADING" instead of hints.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]Simple loading screen without 3D models, the inscription [b]"LOADING"[/b] instead of hints.[/size]

[size=3][b]Recommended mods[/b][/size] if you want to achieve the same result as on the first screenshot.
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/98/?]KenMOD - Time on loading screen[/url][/size] [color=gray]by Kenney.[/color] In the mod settings disable all except hints.
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7901/?]No Menu and Loading Smoke[/url][/size] [color=gray]by IceKK.[/color]
Without these mods everything will look as on the second screenshot.

[size=3][b]Requirements:[/b][/size]
Dawnguard, Hearthfire, Dragonborn.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19/?]Unofficial Skyrim Patch[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23491/?]Unofficial Dawnguard Patch[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25127/?]Unofficial Hearthfire Patch[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31083/?]Unofficial Dragonborn Patch[/url]

[size=3][b]Installation:[/b][/size]
Use NMM and install in the usual way
[size=3][b]Manual installation:[/b][/size]
Place archive contents in the Data folder and activate in launcher Simple loading screen.esp
[color=gray]For example: Program Files (x86)Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data[/color]

Mod I did it for myself, but I'm not greedy, who need to take and sorry for my English =)
author: GrimBeaverNMM
